Title: 203: Highlights of DSGO 2018 According to an Aspiring Data Scientist
Description:
In this episode of the SuperDataScience Podcast, I chat with the aspiring data scientist, Sasha Prokhorova. You will learn about Sasha's background experience and journey to Data Science, get valuable tips on how to get recognized and get job offers in the space of Data Science, and also get to hear some of the key things that she had learned from the speakers during the DSGO 2018 event.


If you enjoyed this episode, check out show notes, resources, and more at www.superdatascience.com/203
